quotes.quote: Retirement is wonderful. It's doing nothing without worrying about getting caught at it.
The trouble with retirement is that you never get a day off.
Happiness is being retired and spending all of my kids' inheritance before I die!
Age is only a number, a cipher for the records. A man can't retire his experience. He must use it.
Retirement kills more people than hard work ever did.
Gainfully unemployed, very proud of it, too.
Retired is being tired twice, I've thought, first tired of working, then tired of not.
Retirement, a time to do what you want to do, when you want to do it, where you want to do it, and, how you want to do it.
When some people retire, it's going to be mighty hard to be able to tell the difference.
While some people can't wait until their retirement, others feel cheated that they have to retire at all.
Sooner or later I'm going to die, but I'm not going to retire.
In retirement, every day is Boss Day and every day is Employee Appreciation Day.
To retire is to begin to die.
For retirement brings repose, and repose allows a kindly judgment of all things.
Sometimes it's hard to tell if retirement is a reward for a lifetime of hard work or a punishment.
When a man retires, his wife gets twice the husband but only half the income.
Retirement is the ugliest word in the language.
Your best retirement plan for retiring happy and prosperous - don't be a burden on others.
I'm now as free as the breeze â€” with roughly the same income.
If you are going to go broke before retirement, retire first.
